Key Match Events: Roston Chase hit 52 for the West Indies as they set South Africa 136 to win their T20 World Cup Super Eight match in Antigua.
Kyle Mayers hit 35 off 34 balls on a tricky pitch in Antigua after West Indies lost Shai Hope (0) and Nicholas Pooran (1) early.
Spinner Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 for 27 while fellow twirler Keshav Maharaj had 1 for 24 in his four overs for the Proteas.
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and asked the West Indies to bat.
The winner of the game will join England in the semifinals of the T20 World Cup.
